### Data Profiling:

**Definition:** Analyze data to understand its structure and quality.

### Metrics:
| Metric | Checks |
|--------|--------|
| Completeness | Null counts |
| Uniqueness | Duplicates |
| Distribution | Value patterns |

### Cleaning Rules:

| Issue | Rule |
|-------|------|
| Nulls | Replace or flag |
| Duplicates | Deduplicate |
| Outliers | Cap or remove |
| Format | Standardize |

### Validation Types:

| Type | Example |
|------|--------|
| Format | Email pattern |
| Range | Age 0-120 |
| Referential | FK exists |
| Business | Total = sum of parts |

### Quality Dimensions:

| Dimension | Metric |
|-----------|--------|
| Accuracy | % correct values |
| Completeness | % non-null |
| Timeliness | Freshness |
| Consistency | Cross-source match |

### Monitoring Approach:

1. Define quality rules
2. Automate checks
3. Track over time
4. Alert on issues

### Tools: Great Expectations, dbt tests

### Quality Tools:

| Tool | Capability |
|------|------------|
| Great Expectations | Testing framework |
| dbt tests | Built-in testing |
| Monte Carlo | Observability |
| Soda | Data monitoring |
